data.title: Carmen Sandiego 3/Credits
authors: Contributors to JH Wiki Collection Wiki
data.meta_description: Full credits for Carmen Sandiego 3 (2023). Columbia Pictures and Movie Land Animation Studios Present An Avi Arad/Lord Miller/Pascal Pictures/Vertigo Entertainment/Rideback Production A International Donut Fund Production A HarperCollins Production A Sony Pictures Animation Film "Carmen Sandiego...
data.text:
"Dance Monkey"

Written and Performed by Toni Watson

Produced by Konstantin Kersting

Courtesy of Elektra Records

By Arrangement with Warner Music Group Film & TV Licensing

"Waka Waka (This Time for Africa)"

Written by Dooh Belly Eugene Victor. J. Hill, Kojidie, Shakira

& Ze Bell Jean Paul

Produced by Shakira, John Hill & Fab

Performed by Shakira feat. Freshlyground

Courtesy of Epic Records

By Arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment

"Jenny (I Wanna Ruin Our Friendship)"

Written by Cherry, Dyna Mink, Goldie Foxx, & Rob Davis

Produced and Performed by Studio Killers

Courtesy of Atlantic Records

By Arrangement with Warner Music Group Film & TV Licensing

"Chasing Summers"

Written by S. Janssen, T. Verwest & W. Janssen

Performed by Tiësto

Courtesy of Musical Freedom

"Carmen Suite No. 1"

Written and Composed by Georges Bizet

Courtesy of Audio Newtwork

"Fun"

Written by Stefan Johnson, Al Burna, Alexander Izquierdo,

Armando C. Perez, Chris Brown, Clarence Coffee Jr.,

JJordvn, Jason Evigan & Marcus Lomax

Produced by Jason Evigan, The Monsters & Strangerz

Performed by Pitbull feat. Chris Brown

Courtesy of Mr.305/Polo Grounds Music/RCA Records

By Arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment

"Pop/Stars"

Written by Harloe, Jessica Karpov & Sebastien Najand

Performed by (G)I-DLE, Jaira Burns, K/DA,

League of Legends & Madison Beer

K/DA appears courtesy of Riot Games

"Summer Feeling"

Written by John-Luke Carter & Tom Straete Lagergren

Produced by Matoma

Performed by Jonah Kagen & Matoma

Matoma appears courtesy of Warner Music Group

"Rain In Ibiza"

Written by Jon Maguire, Calum Scott, Daniel Deimann,

Dennis Bierbrodt, Felix Ferdinand, Felix Jaehn,

Guido Kramer, Jurgen Dohr, Stefan Dabruck & Zak F. Ron

Produced by Felix Jaehn, JUNKX, The Stickmen Project,

Jon "MAGS" Maguire & Franklin

Performed by Calum Scott, Felix Jaehn

& The Stickmen Project

Courtesy of Virgin Records/B-Unique Publishing

Under license from Universal Music Enterprises

"Dance of the Cygnets"

Written and Composed by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky

Arranged by Henry Jackman

Courtesy of Audio Network

"Rock My Body"

Written by Galeyn, Erik Smaaland, Fadil El Ghoul,

Galeyn Tenhaeff, Kristoffer Tømmerbakke, Ralf Kappmeier,

Sascha Lappessen, Shannon Hilversum & Thomas Alisson

Produced by Erik Smaaland, Kristoffer Tømmerbakke and R3HAB

Performed by R3HAB, Sash! & INNA

Courtesy of Spinnin' Records/Warner Chappell Music

By Arrangement with Warner Music Group Film & TV Licensing

"Only You"

Written by Alexis Donn Daugherty & Longwen Wang

Produced by DEXTER KING

Performed by DEXTER KING and Alexis Donn

Courtesy of Monstercat

"Mambo No. 5 (a Little Bit of...)"

Written by Lou Bega, Dámaso Pérez Prado & Zippy Davids

Produced by Goar B, Frank Lio

Donald Fact & Peter Meisel

Performed by Lou Bega

Courtesy of RCA Records/Ariola

By Arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment

"U Can't Touch This"

Written by Alonzo Miller, MC Hammer & Rick James

Produced by MC Hammer, James Early & Felton Pilate

Performed by MC Hammer

Courtesy of EMI Records

Under license from Universal Music Enterprises

"Habanera"

Written and Composed by Georges Bizet

Courtesy of Audio Newtwork

"Kiss from a Rose"

Written and Performed by

Seal Henry Olusegun Olumide Adeola Samuel

Produced by Trevor Horn

Courtesy of Warner Records

By Arrangement with Warner Music Group Film & TV Licensing

"Pound the Alarm"

Written by Onika Maraj, RedOne, Carl Falk,

Rami Yacoub, Bilal Hajji & Achraf Jannusi

Produced by RedOne, Falk and Yacoub

Performed by Nicki Minaj

Courtesy of Young Money/Cash Money/Republic

Under license from Universal Music Enterprises

"Hide and Seek"

Written, Produced and Performed by Imogen Heap

Courtesy of Sony BMG Music UK

By Arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment

"Time After Time"

Written by Cyndi Lauper & Robert Andrew Hyman

Produced by Andreas John & Erik Macholl

Performed by Paratone

Courtesy of We Are Diamond Records

Under license from Universal Music Enterprises

"Live While We're Young"

Written by Savan Kotecha, Rami Yacoub, & Carl Falk

Produced by Rami Yacoub & Carl Falk

Performed by One Direction

Courtesy of Columbia Records

By arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment

"Battle Without Honor or Humanity"

Written & Performed by Tomoyasu Hotei

Courtesy of EMI Music Japan

Under license from Universal Music Enterprises

"Enemy"

Written by Dan Reynolds, Wayne Sermon, Ben McKee,

Daniel Platzman, Robin Fredriksson, Mattias Larsson,

Justin Tranter and Dustin Route p/k/a J.I.D

Performed by Imagine Dragons ft. J.I.D. and Arcane

Imagine Dragons appears courtesy of KidinaKorner

J.I.D. appears courtesy of Dreamville/Interactive

Arcane appears courtesy of Riot Games Music

Courtesy of Interscope/KidinaKorner/Dreamville

Under license from Universal Music Enterprises

"Tangled Up"

Written by Caro Emerald, David Schreurs,

Guy Chambers and Vincent Degiorgio

Performed by Caro Emerald feat. Lokee

Courtesy of MVKA Records
